Omschrijving Wil jij het beste uit jezelf halen binnen een dynamische werkomgeving Ben je klaar om jezelf en onze applicaties verder te ontwikkelen Ga dan met ons deze uitdaging aan   Gezocht Application Developer   Wat ga jij doen LeasePlan Nederland is de grootste leasemaatschappij in Nederland De tevredenheid van de klanten en berijders van onze autos staat hoog in het vaandel Dat bereiken we met gedreven en betrokken medewerkers Ondersteuning vanuit de systemen en applicaties is hierin cruciaal De lease wereld is continue in beweging Traditionele brandstoffen worden steeds sneller vervangen door elektriciteit en waterstof Dit merken we in ons wagenpark maar ook in de maatregelen die de overheid neemt Klanten en berijders willen steeds meer online zaken doen Dat alles vraagt continue aanpassing en verbeteringen van onze applicaties Die applicaties hebben we in eigen beheer en de ontwikkeling doen we zelf Op de afdeling Application Development werken ontwikkelaars met verschillende skills in multidisciplinaire scrumteams Software leveren we op in 2 wekelijkse sprints Op termijn zullen we overgaan naar een nieuw systeem maar de komende jaren zullen we onze huidige applicaties nog moeten door ontwikkelen Daarbij kunnen we versterking gebruiken We zijn op zoek naar ontwikkelaars met kennis van Java en Java script frameworksVereisten Om de functie van Application Developer goed uit te kunnen voeren zijn wij opzoek naar een ontwikkelaar die minimaal 3 tot 5 jaar ervaring heeft met het ontwikkelen van applicatie en hierbij bekend is met de volgende programmeertalen

Team Digitale Opsporing TDO Midden Nederland zoekt een ICTspecialist die voor de digitale opsporing applicaties ontwikkelt en programmeert Het TDO vormt de pijler en de basis van het digitaal specialisme, waar de eenheid in complexe rechercheonderzoeken een beroep op kan doen Ook ondersteunt het team de digitaal rechercheurs in de districten met specialistische kennis enof uitrusting Het team wordt gevormd door ICTers met verschillende specialisaties zoals automotive, video, internet, data analyse, mobile forensics, embedded systemen en minder courante besturingssystemen Wil je je als ICTer een bijdrage leveren aan een veiliger maatschappij Solliciteer dan op deze boeiende vacature en draag bij aan de opsporing van strafbare feitenAls ontwikkelaar pas je, zelfstandig of in teamverband, bestaande software aan, en ontwerp en realiseer je ook nieuwe applicaties Je begeleidt complexe ontwikkelingen voor technische informatiesystemen op het gebied van digitale opsporing Je komt te werken bij het Team Digitale Opsporing van de eenheid MiddenNederland In dit team werken, digitaal rechercheurs, data engineers en data scientistsAls lid van dit team zet jij je kennis en vaardigheden in om de wereld een stukje veiliger te maken Als ontwikkelaar ben jij een van de operationeel specialisten die het mogelijk maakt dat de onderzoeksteams hun werk zo veilig, efficint en betrouwbaar mogelijk kunnen uitvoerenHet is ook mogelijk dat je wordt ingezet in de operatie bijvoorbeeld wanneer de nieuwe softwareapplicatie die je hebt ontwikkeld, voor het eerst wordt ingezet Dan wel dat je gezamenlijk met je collegas ingezet wordt om in de operatie digitale sporen op een forensische juiste wijze veilig te stellenJouw werkzaamheden op een rijTDO maakt onderdeel uit van Dienst Regionale Recherche van de Eenheid Midden Nederland en ondersteunt alle operationele politieteams in de eenheid met specialistische kennis enof uitrusting Het team in Utrecht gaat bestaan uit ongeveer 30 fte en kent meerdere hoofdtaken forensisch, digitaal en internet onderzoek, de inzet van IT binnen speciale operaties en de aanpak van cybercrime Het team bestaat uit een mix van collegas met een recherche achtergrond en ITers Binnen het team zijn verschillende specialisaties aanwezig zoals automotive, internet, dataanalyse, mobile forensics, netwerken, blockchain, hardware hacking, embedded systems, telecom en IoT TDO maakt deel uit van een landelijk netwerk van specialisten op jouw vakgebied TDO Midden Nederland is aan het groeien en zal in juli 2020 in een volledig vernieuwde werkomgeving in Utrecht zijn intrek nemenJe beschikt over een flinke dosis analytische vaardigheden, kunt analyses omzetten in concrete oplossingen en handelt en communiceert tactvol Feiten kun je helder en gestructureerd vastleggen en presenteren Je signaleert kansen en bent alert op trends en ontwikkelingen Daarbij ben je creatief en in staat om outsidethebox te denken Ook kun je goed hoofd en bijzaken onderscheiden en breng je informatie uit diverse bronnen met elkaar in verband Je bent klantgericht, creatief, proactief en op de juiste momenten zeer nauwkeurig Je pakt zaken graag aan en geeft niet snel op Je kunt goed samenwerken met collegas uit verschillende disciplines en bent in staat om collegas te coachen en begeleiden Ten slotte vind je het geen probleem om piketdiensten te draaienDaarnaast beschik je overDe standplaats is Utrecht en er is ruimte voor 1 fteOm deze functie goed uit te kunnen voeren volg je aan de Politieacademie de opleiding voor specifieke inzetbaarheid met eventueel aansluitend een voor de functie benodigd aanvullend opleidingsprogrammaTijdens deze verkorte politieopleiding word je tijdelijk aangesteld als ambtenaar in opleiding Na het voltooien van de opleiding bieden we je een tijdelijke aanstelling aan, waarbij een proeftijd van n jaar van toepassing is Na deze proeftijd volgt zo snel mogelijk een vaste aanstellingVerder kun je het volgende van ons verwachtenDe formele functie binnen het functiegebouw van de politie is operationeel specialist B , werkterrein digitale expertiseBel of mail met Sander Kooy, 06  53 12 69 20, sanderkooypolitienl  als je meer informatie over de functie wilt hebbenVoor vragen over de sollicitatieprocedure bel of mail je met Paul Kraakman, ICT recruiter 06  10 46 38 68, paulkraakmanpolitienl GitHub is looking for a talented Software Engineer to join our Platform Team in the Development Lifecycle organizationOur team is responsible for building and maintaining GitHubs runtime platform This platform enables developers to easily build, deploy and manage the hundreds of applications that make up the worlds largest code hosting platform On the Platform team, youll work with and learn from highly experienced engineers across the entire engineering organization Youll collaborate with product, design and more to deliver the best possible developer experience for all engineers here at GitHubThis team and its parent Development Lifecycle organization are highly distributed across the US  Europe, and span a variety of diverse backgrounds We recognize the value this diversity brings to our teams and our products, so creating and maintaining an environment where every individual feels safe to bring their unique perspective to the challenges were solving is important to usGitHub is the developer company We make it easier for developers to be developers to work together, to solve challenging problems, and to create the worlds most important technologies We foster a collaborative community that can come togetheras individuals and in teamsto create the future of software and make a difference in the worldCustomer Obsessed  Trust by Default  Ship to Learn  Own the Outcome  Growth Mindset  Global Product, Global Team  Anything is Possible  Practice KindnessAt GitHub, we constantly strive to create an environment that allows our employees Hubbers to do the best work of their lives Weve designed one of the coolest workspaces in San Francisco HQ, where many Hubbers work, snack, and create daily The rest of our Hubbers work remotely around the globe Check out an updated list of where we can hire here httpsgithubcomaboutcareersremoteWe are also committed to keeping Hubbers healthy, motivated, focused and creative Weve designed our topnotch benefits program with these goals in mind In a nutshell, weve built a place where we truly love working, we think you will tooGitHub is made up of people from a wide variety of backgrounds and lifestyles We embrace diversity and invite applications from people of all walks of life We dont discriminate against employees or applicants based on gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, race, religion, age, national origin, citizenship, disability, pregnancy status, veteran status, or any other differences Also, if you have a disability, please let us know if theres any way we can make the interview process better for you were happy to accommodatePlease note that benefits vary by country If you have any questions, please dont hesitate to ask your Talent Partner

We are a growing startup in, in the pocess of developing a smart parcelbox and IoT PaaS, located close to the Amstelstation in Amsterdam We are looking for a self motivated and responsible developer who thrives on freedom and enjoys working in an agile startup environmentYou have a Masters Degree or equivalent and several years of experience in development using modern frameworks You have worked with ReactNative, React or Angular, Node and Rails and have experience with REST, protocols and integrating 3rd party APIs You are proficient with LinuxUnix environments You have excellent English communication skills and are based in the Netherlands, preferably around AmsterdamAs a full stack developer you will be joining our development team to build our IoT platform Youll collaborate with our CTO and backend and frontend developers, and work on various aspects of our code and infrastructure You will mostly work in the development of our FrontEnd apps, but you will also build microservices in Nodejs and Rails and continuously deploy to our infrastructure on Google CloudMYPO is a smart parcelbox that allows consumers to receive and return packages effortlessly  However, the company is not a parcelbox manufacturer, we leave that to our production partners Our company is a techstartup, the core of our business is the combination between our cloud platform that connects carriers and consumers, and our smartlock The lock can be used for all types of parcelboxes, for example builtin models in new buildings, or a steel box in the garden The MYPO app than sends the relevant tracking information to the smart lock, receives notifications when a package is delivered and lists all of your online ordersNo longer than a year and a half ago MYPO was just an idea, born out of our own personal frustration with receiving packages Additionally, we believe that MYPO can bring a revolutionary change to the delivery industry With a smart parcel box, it is possible to deliver packages at night, when cities are empty, and deliveries are more efficient and less pollutingSince we started in 2015, we have developed several prototypes and produced our first pilot series Everything has been developed inhouse from the PCB design and firmware to the cloud platform During the past six months we ran a pilot in Rotterdam for the first 25 users together with our partners DHL and KPN The results were positive and consequently MYPO received an investment of 500000 euro for bringing our technology to the market There is currently a lot of interest from corporates as well as municipalitiesIn 5 years, MYPO will be the number 1 supplier of Smart Parcel Lock solutions hardware, application and platform In addition to selling our own Parcelbox, we provide and integrate our technology with various construction companies house front models and parcelbox manufacturers All this while bearing in mind that we want to contribute to the creation of a delivery system which is easy to use for consumers and carriers and less damaging for environment The first step is to extend the team and develop a marketable platform, smart lock and customerfriendly app

Job Description: What You Tell Your Family About Your JobI create software that makes sure customers cannot be hacked I work in cyber security yes something with computersYour team creates containers All in small projects Together these containers form the software solution on which the entire ON2IT business relies The software runs on bare metal k8s, in Amazon or in Azure It does not matter which programming language you use, as long as it works And your colleagues think so too Keep it simple, fail fast And CI  CD is a must So unit tests The software started out as a monolith, so occasionally you adjust existing code in it This is PHP  Symfony2 These days we see more and more Python and especially GoYou also design the solution, come up with ideas and participate in discussions, so we lose as little time as possibleMost of your day is about coding Every day we start with a standup If you work from home that day, you dial in Depending on what comes up, you work on issues from Gitlab, you participate in design sessions, or you check your own results for correct operation in production You prefer to participate in our pizza sessions a companywide afternoon  evening event where we do a technical deepdive on a specific topic This is usually about security

Job Description: FunctieomschrijvingRoyal Schiphol GroupRoyal Schiphol Group brings the world within reach We connect the Netherlands with the rest of the world, creating value for the economy and society Achieving this involves over 2,000 employees working 24 hours a day, 7 days a week Our ambition is to develop Schiphol into Europes best hub Airport, both for passengers and for airlines Innovation is key to achieve this ambitionDepartment DigitalThe Digital department at Schiphol is organized into three Value Streams, based on the three Schiphol priorities Airport  Airline Performance, Customer Experience and Smart Assets  Buildings There is also a Data  Analytics team that provides the Value Streams with predictive data and the Innovation Hub that focuses on Horizon 2 and 3 innovation The various staffs, such as HR, finance and support, are represented across the departmentWhere do you end upYou end up in the Smart Assets  Buildings streamSmart Assets  Buildings focuses on the development of actionable insights and products and services with which Schiphols capacity assets and buildings can be utilized more sustainably and efficientlyYou end up in a team that is fully developing with ambitious goalsThe SmartVOP goal is currently to ensure that disruptions do not affect the handling of aircraft We do this by dealing smartly with assetsThe roleAs a frontend developer youll be part of a scrum team working on a new application for Asset Management to help guarantee operational continuity at SchipholTechnology stack Typescript and ScSS Angular 6 Event Store Nightwatch  CucumberWho are youIts nice if you have experience withWhat we ask

Job Title: Senior Full Stack Developer - App Marketing
Job Description: It was not so long ago that booking a trip to see the Eiffel Tower, stroll down New Yorks iconic Madison Avenue or feel the sand between our toes on Copacabana Beach was simply a matter of a few taps on our smartphoneIn fact, thats what we do at Bookingcom We make it easier for everyone to experience the world And while that world might feel a little farther away right now, were busy preparing for when the world is ready to travel once moreMarketing department is looking for Senior Full Stack developers all around the globeOne of our objectives is to become the 1 travel app in the world, with an app first approach to everything we doThe App Marketing team is responsible for driving adoption and promotion of our mobile app as the preferred channel through banner and placements across other channels web, emails, offline, campaigns and activities We are also responsible for the tracking and measurement of ad placements, marketing campaigns and apps lifecycle Additionally, the team is responsible for providing the best first time onboarding experience in the mobile app and ensuring a smooth transition of customers from the web to the appBResponsibleAs a Full Stack Developer, you are responsible for developing worldclass, complete web applications, both on the backend and frontend, for monitoring and addressing performance and security, and for developing customerfocused and scalable user experiences You will work sidebyside with designers, product owners, copywriters and other developers to create new features, test your own ideas, and push changes live for billions of usersBSkilledUnderstanding the full stack of web development is vitally important in this role We need selfstarters who are great at solving problems, who initiate discussions, are solutionsoriented, customer focused and believe that any challenge can be scaled with the right mindset and toolsBOffered

Job Title: Security Use Case Developer for Applications (m/f)
Job Description: At a glanceDesign the future, innovate the pastKeeping the bank safe together, that is what matters to us The need for information security is increasing rapidly The financial sector is a permanent target for attackers This is why we continue to search for better ways to make digital banking safer A big responsibility, because a lot is at stake Do you have the knowledge and skills needed to protect our data and a drive to improve security for our customers Then we are looking for youAs Senior Security Engineer you will work for the Application Security Monitoring team which consists of 7 DevSecOps resources Goal of this ASMteam is to protect hundreds of applications against cyberattacks via automation of several generic use cases The team develops, deploys and maintains these use cases and steers the process to onboard all applications to implement those use casesABN AMRO is looking for a senior cloud Security Engineer As Security Engineer you work in the CISO Operations  Intelligence department It is a challenging and professional security environment with about 50 security specialists Main goal is to protect the bank against all kinds of cyberattacks CISO Operations  Intelligence is also owner of the technology that drives the SOCWe look especially for a security specialist who can work as engineerdeveloper in our team and is able to deliver as a team We work in an AgileScrum way of workingThe success of our organisation depends on the quality of our people and the ideas that they have Truly surprising insights and innovative solutions for our clients result from an interplay of cultures, knowledge and experience Diversity is therefore extremely important to our organisation To ensure that everyone at ABN AMRO can develop their talents, we encourage an inclusive culture in which all colleagues feel engaged and appreciatedBasic SkillsDesirable skills ABN AMRO is migrating to Azure Cloud All Security use cases needs to work in this new environment as wellOther SkillsAn EU working permit is required for this positionWe are offeringInterested in this position Please respond to this vacancy onlineFor more information you can contact Rob Thiehatten, the IT Engineering Lead of CISO Operations  Intelligence at robthiehattennlabnamrocomWe are looking forward to meeting youWe do not respond to acquisition enquiries from agencies

IntroductionASML is a market leader in scanning lithography technology We provide chipmakers with hardware, software and services to mass produce patterns on silicon This role is positioned in the Customer Support Applications Engineering department which acts as the bridge between global customers and ASMLs engineering development Our mission is to ensure optimal use of ASML technology for customers production processes As a Senior Application Engineer you will be the driving force in enabling worldwide customers to meet their semiconductor process roadmap using ASML technology Are you the technical guru were looking for to make an impact on the semiconductor industryYour main mission is to closely engage with our customers to propose tailormade hightech solutions With your innovative mindset, you go above and beyond to help our partners reach their production goalsSecondly, you will shape our partners requirements and drive for solutions within engineering development You will ensure both structural issue resolution as well as identify potential revenue generationFinally, you will train your colleagues on new means and methods that you have developed with a team Besides the technical focus, you will also have the opportunity to guide junior engineers in their soft skills developmentAs a key expert in the applications team, you establish new ways of working to create tomorrows value through new ASML products and services By leading performance improvement projects in a complex environment, your work will have a significant business impact Your technical knowledge about photolithography applications allows you to fulfill a consultancy role within ASMLIn addition, you excel in data processing eg MATLAB Python R and statistical analysis in order to interpret customer data from various use cases and machines Combined with your decisionmaking and communication skills, you propose timely and highquality solutions which make optimal use of existing methodsYour main interfaces are ASMLs global customers and ASML colleagues from various disciplines including business and operations experts In addition, you create new channels of communication by recognizing where collaboration can be strengthened in order to achieve business growthThis job requires up to 20 of international travel to provide tailormade support to our customersBSc, MSc or PhD in Mechanics, Physics, Mathematics, Electrical Engineering, Chemistry or a similar engineering degreeBased at ASML global headquarters in the Netherlands, you will have the unique opportunity to benefit from a high quality of living, excellent worklife balance and being surrounded by a large expat community We welcome international candidates to join our diverse and inclusive team and offer a relocation package if hired from abroadThis job is challenging and fastpaced while also being highly rewarding It will involve continuous professional and personal development If you meet the above requirements and consider yourself to have the right combination of technical, analytical and personal skills, apply nowPlease include your resume and a cover letter when applying for this role where you explain your motivation to join our team

sprint You work in threeweekly sprints and the goal is to, as a team, finalise the jointly planned cases at the end of each sprint For each sprint the planned cases are pokered highlow split and at such as web servers, internet protocols, file systems, commandline management and tools such as FTP A good command of the English language, both in writing and speech Nice to haves PHP, Perl, Python, career opportunities Because Voordeeluitjesnl does not stand still, but neither do you Good conditions a competitive salary, 24 days holiday and appropriate allowances We also make provision for ones old age you will partake in a group pension insurance plan A position within an enthusiastic, growing organisation whereat the ambience and team spirit are essential Where you are given the space to learn, including trial and error, everyone shares knowledge with each other and memorable company outings are the norm Everything you need to carry out your job properly, including a sitstanddesk, Application Engineer is samen met de application engineers en business consultants verantwoordelijk voor het goed laten functioneren van alle applicaties binnen de organisatie Meerdere functies beschikbaar voor juniors of mediors met HBO werk en denkniveau Naast een stabiele infrastructuur, wil onze klant ook graag flinke stappen vooruit maken Actuele voorbeelden zijn Internet of Things, DevOps werkwijze, Infrastructure as Code en Cloud Je beschikt over technische kennis en bent in staat om patches en nieuwe releases rondom een applicatie te installeren, te testen, uit te rollen en te monitorenVerder ben je bezig met het doorvoeren van vernieuwingen vanuit eigen kennis en expertise, waarbij de nadruk ligt op beheersbaarheid, toekomstbestendigheid, veiligheid en continuteit Je bent proactief in je support richting klanten door te komen met verbetervoorstellenJe maakt deel uit van een gedreven en ervaren ITteam met een omvang van 50 medewerkers, van support engineers tot datacenters bij leveranciersDit is een mooie uitdaging voor iemand die wat minder interesse heeft gekregen in het programmeren en zich meer wil richten op adviesconsultancyHieronder wordt verstaan het op eigen initiatief bedenken van verbeteringen inclusief het onderzoeken van deze mogelijkheden en het schrijven van een advies voor het beter laten functioneren van de applicatiesDe organisatie heeft momenteel zon 160 verschillende applicaties in gebruik oa Ortec, een CRM pakket, Infor, Streamserve, Weblogic van Oracle, FTP, Apache, Tom Cat, Wordpress content management systeem, Control M plannen van badges, Veemanager, en veel zelfgebouwde web applicaties Er zijn momenteel circa 7 application engineers in het team en circa 7 business consultantsDe Applicatie Beheerder  Application Engineer is een proactieve engineer die als onderdeel van een ITteam problemen structureel oplost met behulp van de Kanban methode en continu bezig is met het verbeteren van de applicatiesDe Applicatie Beheerder  Application Engineer monitort de applicaties teneinde problemen te voorkomen en bedenkt structurele oplossingen samen met de application administrators, business consultants, keyusers en leveranciers Je geeft proactief support aan klantengebruikersDe Applicatie Beheerder  Applicatie Engineer fungeert als intermediair tussen de business en interne  externe klanten, je hebt regelmatig contact met Key Users en tevens maak je afspraken met leveranciersJe bent als applicatie beheerder  application engineer bezig met het vertalen van wensen  eisen van gebruikers richting applicatie, wijzigingen doorvoeren, inrichting en onderhoud van de applicatiesTevens ben je verantwoordelijk voor het aansturen en cordineren van de interne en externe leveranciers voor technisch beheer, beoordelen nieuwe Releases, begeleiden van implementaties Daarnaast moet je ook configureren, installeren, testen en uitrollen van nieuwe releases en patches OTAP, SCRUM, ITILTevens documenteren van de applicaties samen met de bijbehorende gegevens en interfacesOplossen van verstoringen en implementeren van changes in zowel de acceptatie als productieomgevingHet bepalen van rechten voor users, fix policys opstellen, aanspreekpunt voor de consultants van de leveranciers is ook een taak voor de application engineerEisenVoor deze vacature van Applicatie Beheerder  Application Engineer vragen wij HBOWO ontwikkeld analytisch vermogen Relevante kennis van IT in het algemeen en gedegen en uptodate kennis van ITapplicatietechnologien aangevuld met adequate kennis betreffende ITIL bij voorkeur versie 4, Job Title: Full Stack Web Developer at EdTech scaleup - Eindhoven
Job Description: Drieam is an EdTech scaleup, passionate about developing  implementing software to enable the ultimate learning experience Were with 30 young and committed professionals who constantly strive to improve the lives of teachers, students and staff all over the world Does this sound like something youd want to be a part of Read onAs our Full Stack Web Developer, you will join a fast growing and highly skilled team You are a curious and fast learner that soaks up knowledge and new experiences like a sponge You are comfortable working both the front and backend and will have no trouble creating brand new features from scratch, together with our UX and Business teamsYour profileYou are a team player who loves learning from your talented colleagues Of course you dont shy away from ownership, are able to carry ideas from creation to implementation and share our passion for clean and welltested software At the end of the day, nothing makes you happier than seeing well written and highquality codeYou have a relevant Bachelor or Master DegreeYou have experience as a Full Stack Web Developer You are fluent in either the English or Dutch language, the more languages, the betterWhat we love to seeExperience with frontend and backend development, and looking forward to work with React  RubyonRailsThe ambition to scale products towards international successWhat awaits youA FullTime job at a fast growing EdTech company Feeling like youre a part of sustainable changeA competitive salary and a good benefits packageThe freedom and responsibility to make a real differenceWork with RubyonRails for backend, React for our frontend our own UI library incorporating Ant Design, GitHub Actions for CICD and Heroku We spent a lot of time on continuously improving our technology stackTest driven development using tools like RSpec for backend unit and integration tests, Capibara for endtoend tests, Jest with Enzyme for frontend testsLots of personal development and focus on code quality, including pair programming, extensive code reviews, architecture reviews and of course online courses and meetupsAn informal and international environmentA free and delicious lunch every single dayMindblowing team eventsAbout DrieamDrieam is enabling higher education, commercial training providers  business schools to deliver the ultimate learning experience with Canvas Our customers include large educational institutes like the Eindhoven University of Technology  Hogeschool Utrecht, international business schools such as IMD, Insead  Vlerick, and commercial training providers like Schola Medica  PIVO Our office is located in the city centre of Eindhoven, in a stylish and newly renovated building, next to lots of urban hotspots and great bars  restaurants We are at a 10 min walk from the train station and easily accessible by bike, car and public transport For most of us, Drieam feels like a second home where you can just be and develop yourself and get the best out of you

Team Digitale Opsporing TDO Midden Nederland zoekt een ICTspecialist die voor de digitale opsporing applicaties ontwikkelt en programmeert Het TDO vormt de pijler en de basis van het digitaal specialisme, waar de eenheid in complexe rechercheonderzoeken een beroep op kan doen Ook ondersteunt het team de digitaal rechercheurs in de districten met specialistische kennis enof uitrusting Het team wordt gevormd door ICTers met verschillende specialisaties zoals automotive, video, internet, data analyse, mobile forensics, embedded systemen en minder courante besturingssystemen Wil je je als ICTer een bijdrage leveren aan een veiliger maatschappij Solliciteer dan op deze boeiende vacature en draag bij aan de opsporing van strafbare feiten Locaties Utrecht Organisatieonderdeel MiddenNederland Vakgebieden ICT Niveau HBO Wat ga je doen Als ontwikkelaar pas je, zelfstandig of in teamverband, bestaande software aan, en ontwerp en realiseer je ook nieuwe applicaties Je begeleidt complexe ontwikkelingen voor technische informatiesystemen op het gebied van digitale opsporing Je komt te werken bij het Team Digitale Opsporing van de eenheid MiddenNederland In dit team werken, digitaal rechercheurs, data engineers en data scientists Als lid van dit team zet jij je kennis en vaardigheden in om de wereld een stukje veiliger te maken Als ontwikkelaar ben jij een van de operationeel specialisten die het mogelijk maakt dat de onderzoeksteams hun werk zo veilig, efficint en betrouwbaar mogelijk kunnen uitvoeren Het is ook mogelijk dat je wordt ingezet in de operatie bijvoorbeeld wanneer de nieuwe softwareapplicatie die je hebt ontwikkeld, voor het eerst wordt ingezet Dan wel dat je gezamenlijk met je collegas ingezet wordt om in de operatie digitale sporen op een forensische juiste wijze veilig te stellen Jouw werkzaamheden op een rij je zet zelfstandig projecten op en stemt requirements af met de gebruiker en je bent in staat om gebruikerswensen te vertalen naar systeemeisen Je begeleidt ook de uitbesteding van softwareapplicaties en technische informatiesystemen je bent niet perse gebonden aan een programmeertaal of platform, maar probeert verschillende programmeertalen uit afhankelijk van de probleemstelling je levert een bijdrage aan het ontwerpen en integreren van complexe netwerken enof infrastructuren in het team vervul je een coachende rol op jouw vakgebied en begeleid en coach je collegas Er wordt van je verwacht dat je een prominente rol speelt in het delen van kennis Vanuit je vak fungeer je als aanspreekpunt voor en maak je afspraken met in en externe opdrachtgevers Waar ga je werken TDO maakt onderdeel uit van Dienst Regionale Recherche van de Eenheid Midden Nederland en ondersteunt alle operationele politieteams in de eenheid met specialistische kennis enof uitrusting Het team in Utrecht gaat bestaan uit ongeveer 30 fte en kent meerdere hoofdtaken forensisch, digitaal en internet onderzoek, de inzet van IT binnen speciale operaties en de aanpak van cybercrime Het team bestaat uit een mix van collegas met een recherche achtergrond en ITers Binnen het team zijn verschillende specialisaties aanwezig zoals automotive, internet, dataanalyse, mobile forensics, netwerken, blockchain, hardware hacking, embedded systems, telecom en IoT TDO maakt deel uit van een landelijk netwerk van specialisten op jouw vakgebied TDO Midden Nederland is aan het groeien en zal in juli 2020 in een volledig vernieuwde werkomgeving in Utrecht zijn intrek nemen Wie ben jij Je beschikt over een flinke dosis analytische vaardigheden, kunt analyses omzetten in concrete oplossingen en handelt en communiceert tactvol Feiten kun je helder en gestructureerd vastleggen en presenteren Je signaleert kansen en bent alert op trends en ontwikkelingen Daarbij ben je creatief en in staat om outsidethebox te denken Ook kun je goed hoofd en bijzaken onderscheiden en breng je informatie uit diverse bronnen met elkaar in verband Je bent klantgericht, creatief, proactief en op de juiste momenten zeer nauwkeurig Je pakt zaken graag aan en geeft niet snel op Je kunt goed samenwerken met collegas uit verschillende disciplines en bent in staat om collegas te coachen en begeleiden Ten slotte vind je het geen probleem om piketdiensten te draaien Daarnaast beschik je over een afgeronde hboopleiding, bij voorkeur op ICT gebied, met een technische specialisatie ervaring met de ontwikkeling van software in teams enkele jaren ervaring in de ICT, specifiek in het ontwikkelen van applicatiessoftware ontwikkeling een rijbewijs B goede kennis van de Engelse taal in woord en geschrift Wat wij bieden De standplaats is Utrecht en er is ruimte voor 1 fte Om deze functie goed uit te kunnen voeren volg je aan de Politieacademie de opleiding voor specifieke inzetbaarheid met eventueel aansluitend een voor de functie benodigd aanvullend opleidingsprogramma Tijdens deze verkorte politieopleiding word je tijdelijk aangesteld als ambtenaar in opleiding Na het voltooien van de opleiding bieden we je een tijdelijke aanstelling aan, waarbij een proeftijd van n jaar van toepassing is Na deze proeftijd volgt zo snel mogelijk een vaste aanstelling Verder kun je het volgende van ons verwachten een bruto maandsalaris van minimaal  2866, en maximaal  4624, schaal 10 Bbp op basis van een 36urige werkweek 8 en vakantie en 8,33 eindejaarsuitkering goede pensioenregeling en betaald ouderschapsverlof meer info over verlof, regelingen en mogelijkheden De formele functie binnen het functiegebouw van de politie is operationeel specialist B, werkterrein digitale expertise

Jouw werkzaamheden als Magic DeveloperAls Magic Developer ga jij meebouwen aan onze applicatie EuroPort, het in Nederland en inmiddels ook over de landsgrenzen toonaangevende Cloud gebaseerde bankplatform, dat alle soorten vermogensopbouw activiteiten mogelijk maakt De focus ligt hierbij op aandelenhandel, beleggen, sparen en betalen In EuroPort worden op snelle, betrouwbare en veilige wijze miljoenen rekeningen en beleggingsportefeuilles beheerd en honderdduizenden transacties per uur verwerktJe gaat aan de slag in een van onze Scrum teams Samen met jouw collegas werk je aan het onderhouden van bestaande software en houd je daarnaast bezig met het implementeren van volledig nieuwe functionaliteiten Waarbij je jouw eigen ideen kunt uitvoeren Omdat jij graag in teamverband kennis deelt, krijg jij er een kick van om andere collegas te inspireren met jouw ervaringErgens tussen 0700 en 1000 ben je een ochtendmensof juist niet kom je binnen en start jij je werkdag met het doorlopen van je mail Rond 1000 uur vindt de dagelijkse standup plaats Dit is het moment van de dag waarop je met het hele team bij elkaar staat en je vertelt wat je de vorige dag hebt gedaan, vandaag gaat doen en of je ergens hulp bij nodig hebt Na een verse lunch in ons gezellige bedrijfsrestaurant, review je bijvoorbeeld de code van n van je collegas en geef je hier feedback op In het team hanteren wij twee digitale boarden met daarop werkzaamheden voor het team Het eerste board betreft de actuele sprint, hierin staan de meldingen en taken van de lopende sprint doorlooptijd 3 weken Van alle taken is de progressie zichtbaar en is inzichtelijk wie van het team met welke taak bezig is Het tweede board betreft een Kanban board, hierop komen ad hoc meldingen terecht Deze meldingen hebben vaak prio en moeten tussendoor opgepakt worden Gedurende de werkzaamheden voor de sprint, of het Kanbanboard, bereiden wij ook al plannen voor de volgende sprint voor Tijdens de sprint is er ook een block gereserveerd voor het gehele team om samen de refinement van de volgende sprint uit te werken Dit betreft dus een brainstormsessie Hierin worden de meldingen voorzien van op te pakken taken en worden schattingen voor de doorlooptijd van die taken bepaaldAls je gedreven bent om iedere dag verder te groeien ben je bij Topicus uitstekend op je plek Niet voor niets zoeken we een ervaren Magic Developer die toe is aan een tweede of zelfs derde stap in zijn of haar carrire Je hebt minimaal vijf jaar werkervaring, hebt een hbo of wostudie Technische Informatica afgerond en je bent gewend om projectmatig te werken Je hebt humor en relativeringsvermogen en bent communicatief vaardig, in woord en geschrift Verder hebben ervaring met Magic Op dit moment ontwikkelen wij in XPA versie 463 Het gebruik van een Oracle Database Een Software Oriented Architecture SOA Message Oriented Communication JMS Het opzetten van een API XSDAls je daarnaast ook nog ervaring hebt met Angular, Unit Testing, Linux, Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery CICD, AgileScrum en ontwikkelervaring in Java, dan is dat een zeer sterke preAl snel na jouw eerste werkdag plan je een gesprek met jouw Chapter Lead in om te praten over waar jij staat, wat jouw ambities zijn en wat ervoor nodig is om die waar te maken Waarom Omdat wij vinden dat jij moet doen waar je goed in bent en waar je energie van krijgt Wellicht wil jij betrokken zijn bij het ontwikkelen en lanceren van nieuwe producten die Finance gaan veranderen Lijkt het je gaaf om jouw kennis over te dragen op collegas of trainees Of zie jij jezelf later in een leidinggevende rol Hoe jij jouw toekomst ook ziet, bij ons is het mogelijkTopicus is het ITbedrijf met impact Met jouw talent lever je een bijdrage aan transparante Finance in Nederland en ver daarbuiten Daar krijg je iets voor terug dat niet in geld uit te drukken is voldoening Dat is ook n van de redenen dat Topicanen actief meepraten over de toekomst en inrichting van onze organisatie En natuurlijk zijn de primaire en secundaire arbeidsvoorwaarden uitstekend Bekijk hieronder enkele job benefits

DescriptionDo you want to experiment with innovative technologies, including Cloud Computing, Machine Learning, and Internet of Things Are you passionate about educating, training, designing, and building enterprise cloud computing solutions for a diverse and challenging set of customersAmazon Web Services AWS, a subsidiary of Amazoncom and a leader in Cloud Computing, is seeking interns to join our AWS Internship program with Professional Services This is a unique opportunity for driven selfstarters to play a key role in a fastgrowing business and to deliver significant value to AWS customers of all sizes from nimble startups to global brands The skills and experiences you gain will be highly sought after throughout the industry and give you the opportunity for the career of a lifetimeThe AWS Professional Services organization is a global team of experts that helps AWS customers realize their desired business outcomes when using the AWS Cloud We deliver focused guidance through our global specialty practices, which cover a variety of solutions, technologies, and industries In addition to working alongside our customers, we share our experience through tech talk webinars, White Papers, and blog posts that are available to anyone As a Professional Services intern, you will gain handson experience in cloud computing, develop business acumen, and learn about Amazons peculiar culture You will work on projects, have the opportunity to obtain the AWS Cloud Practitioner certification, and attend professional development eventsUpon successful completion of the 36 month internship program, select interns will receive a fulltime offer to join as an Associate Professional Services Consultant which includes a sixmonth residency in either Munich, Madrid or London or virtual training program post completion of their degree programAll of our Professional Services Consultants are positioned along tracks likeDevOps Specialist  A leader in building advanced computing systems that harness continuous integrationcontinuous deployment pipelines and utilize the strengths of cloud computing to build scalable and economical systems for clientsCloud Infrastructure Architect  An expert in cloudbased networking and system rollouts CIAs specialize in network performance, infrastructure provisioning, and building Application Programming Interfaces APIsApplication Developer  AppDev resources are specialists in designing applications that run natively in the cloud They are experts in building programs that run on any number of platforms including virtualized instances, containers, or server less architectureBig Data  Analytics  Big Data role supports our services that leverage data and produce business insights, which may include using Machine LearningArtificial Intelligence MLAI Helping our customers use and integrate Big Data services in what is arguably our industrys most exciting space The portfolio of services covers EMR Hadoop, DynamoDB NoSQL, MangoDB, and Apache CassandraSecurity Consultant  supports our services that have a focus on enabling security specialists using AWS Services including Identity Access Management IAM, GuardDuty, Shield, Key Management Service KMS, CloudTrail, CloudHSM, Inspector etc Within AWS, security is job zero, and we believe that solid security practices are the foundation for using the Cloud We are looking for candidates who are passionate about working with products targeted for security professionalsCome chart your own path at AmazonAmazon Equal Opportunity Employer EEOAmazon is an equal opportunities employer We believe passionately that employing a diverse workforce is central to our success We make recruiting decisions based on your experience and skills We value your passion to discover, invent, simplify and buildEU Student Programs Team AWS EMEA SARL NetherlandsJob ID A1313126

Use your extensive experience and expertise to deliver a platform that enables our customers to build banks that people loveYou have a solid background in software development, design and architectural patternsAs a Principal Backend Developer you will help define and execute the technical vision for the product You will help with the prototyping and validation of new architectural and technological ideas, ways of working, efficiency gains and refactoring initiatives Youll work across departments, foster collaboration, and youll be the face of our product vision and success internally and externally You will also interact with teams from the PreSales and Customer Success Departments to ensure technology feedback from customers and field engineers is incorporated You will have advice based on experience and deep technical understanding of software development, practices and frameworks You lead by example, radiate our way of working and our path to success You will take on the expert role in all topics related to BackendThis role is part of a highly skilled multidisciplinary product team in RD As part of the team, you will contribute to new and existing functionalities, proof of concepts, and technical improvements that will be implemented in the Retail Banking domain of the Digital Banking Platform Your specific focus will be Payment Capabilities, but ultimately you would also be expected to contribute to the delivery of other capabilities within the Retail Banking domainBackbase provides a modern software solution developed in microservices architecture, ensuring financial institutions can build on the top of cuttingedge technology As such, many modern principles have been adopted such as continuous integration and delivery We have also adopted Agile practices that contribute to rapid delivery, with decisions being driven out of the team with autonomy rather than top downThe underlying technology runs on the best of breed technology available today such as Spring Boot, coupled with our own inhouse libraries to ensure consistent delivery to a highly regulated banking market Our technology drives solutions in a variety of ways for customers, from Cloudnative, globally scaled deployments to onpremise managed application servers, demanding smart thinking and innovative solutions from our people

Job Title: Developer bij Tof POS-platform in Amsterdam
Job Description: IntroductieBen jij momenteel opzoek naar een nieuwe uitdaging, werk je graag in Amsterdam bij een bedrijf met een eigen platform dat nog steeds groeiende is Hou je van uitdagingen en werk je graag in een innovatieve, informele organisatie met volop groei en ontwikkelmogelijkheden Lees dan snel de volledige vacature en wie weet ga jij hier binnenkort op gesprekOrganisatieHet bedrijf, gespecialiseerd in POS Point of Sale software bestaat al ruim 10 jaar en is sindsdien enorm gegroeid binnen Nederland en ze groeien nog steeds, waardoor ze momenteel naar nieuwe collegas zoeken om dit groeiproces door te zetten De core van dit bedrijf ligt in het leveren van een totaalpakket aan bezorg en afhaal restaurants Naast een website krijgt elk restaurant ook een eigen gebruikersvriendelijke app met meerdere slimme functies en een gentegreerd betaalsysteem Inmiddels maken reeds duizenden restaurants naar alle tevredenheid al gebruik van deze POS software Dat de nodige uitdagingen komen kijken bij een app met zoveel data en datastromen zal je ook duidelijk zijnFunctieJe komt te werken in een klein en gemoedelijk team In deze functie zal je naast het fixen van bugs en het optimaliseren van de applicatie ook een deel van de tijd besteden aan het uitdenken van nieuwe features Je krijgt veel vrijheid om eigen inbreng te leveren en zal creatief worden uitgedaagd Om ieders kennis optimaal te benutten wordt er veel kennis gedeeld en krijg je de ruimte om je eigen werkritme te bepalen Collegas gaan erg informeel met elkaar om en er is veel onderlinge betrokkenheidDaarnaast zal je bezig zijn met het implementeren van microservices en het opdelen van het ERP systeem Om dit te realiseren wordt voornamelijk met PHP en Laravel gewerkt Aan de frontend wordt er gebruik gemaakt van oa HTML5, CSS3, jQuery, JavascriptMet een groot en veelgebruikt platform kun je niet zomaar alles van de een op de andere dag omgooien en moet je er dus vooral de uitdaging van inzien om alle mogelijkheden optimaal te benutten om de applicatie te verbeteren Ben je benieuwd naar het aanbod Lees dan verderFunctieeisenAanbod

IntroductionAs an Application Developer, you will lead IBM into the future by translating system requirements into the design and development of customized systems in an agile environment The success of IBM is in your hands as you transform vital business needs into code and drive innovation Your work will power IBM and its clients globally, collaborating and integrating code into enterprise systems You will have access to the latest education, tools and technology, and a limitless career path with the worlds technology leader Come to IBM and make a global impactYour Role and ResponsibilitiesYou will take part in designing new and existing applications and you will be able to translate functional demands in logical solutions Still, you know how to handle less structured input of clients and translate these to a logical working application You will be working on projects for large international companies Being a CNET Developer with numbers of years of experience you are independent, able to take responsibility, proactive and preciseRequired Technical and Professional ExpertiseYou have at least a bachelor degree in IT You have proven experience as a Net developer You also have experience with ASPNet, MVC, Entity Frameworks, MS SQL server, Web services etc You are familiar with project management methodologies and project planning, Linux platform, CentOS Red Hat You have a cando mentality with problem solving and analytical skills, a keen interest in how technology can be applied to solve business problems of clients and the will to implement these solutions for our clients You are also eager to learn and you have excellent communication skills, and you have a broad interest in application technologies and middlewareIt is a benefit if you have experience with Design Patterns and unit testingThe IBM Client Innovation Center CIC is an entrepreneurial startup with the support of the worlds largest IT and consulting services company IBMWe are operating from 16 locations spread across Europe This way we are able to meet the technical, language, time zone, and regulatory requirements of projects for local clientsIn 2013 we opened our doors to the first Client Innovation Center in Benelux in the vibrant city of Groningen Since then, we have been growing massively, now counting more than 300 employees Weve got our own Design Studio and DevOps Garage and opened up a second office in Amsterdam From design to maintenance, we work on a lot of interesting projects for the worlds top clients with the aim to deliver the best solutions in the fields of agile and creative software engineeringBecause we keep growing, we are constantly looking for both experienced professionals and young associates that are talented, enthusiastic people with an interest in technology, who want to work on innovative solutions We are a group of people who inspire each other to explore the possibilities and paths available And thats where you come inStart creating your own career path nowYour Life  IBMWhat matters to you when youre looking for your next career challengeMaybe you want to get involved in work that really changes the world What about somewhere with incredible and diverse career and development opportunities  where you can truly discover your passion Are you looking for a culture of openness, collaboration and trust  where everyone has a voice What about all of these If so, then IBM could be your next career challenge Join us, not to do something better, but to attempt things you never thought possibleImpact Inclusion Infinite Experiences Do your best work everIBMs greatest invention is the IBMer We believe that progress is made through progressive thinking, progressive leadership, progressive policy and progressive action IBMers believe that the application of intelligence, reason and science can improve business, society and the human condition Restlessly reinventing since 1911, we are the largest technology and consulting employer in the world, with more than 380,000 IBMers serving clients in 170 countriesLocation StatementFor additional information about location requirements, please discuss with the recruiter following submission of your applicationBeing You  IBMIBM is committed to creating a diverse environment and is proud to be an equal opportunity employer All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, pregnancy, disability, age, veteran status, or other characteristics IBM is also committed to compliance with all fair employment practices regarding citizenship and immigration status

Job Description: Auth0 is a unicorn that just closed a 120M Series F round of funding, with total capital raised to date of 330M and valuation of nearly 2B We are growing rapidly and looking for exceptional new team members to add to our exceptional talent pool  and who will help take us to the next level of success One team, one scoreOur vision is to provide people with secure access to any application in one click or less And our promise is to make identity work for everyonewhether youre a developer looking to innovate, or a security professional looking to mitigate We are looking for curious, excited, boundarypushing team members So, if youre a big thinker who is nimble and adaptable, Auth0 may be an ideal place for you to shineWe are growing the Auth0 Administration Experience Engineering team and are looking for a Full Stack Engineer to help us design and build an amazing product You would be a great fit for the team if you enjoy working on challenging problems and care deeply about the products enduser experience Not only are we looking for a talented engineer, but we are also looking for someone who will contribute to our culture Many of our customers are larger enterprise organizations The administrators in these companies care about security and want to make sure their employees access vendors platforms with the minimum privileges required, using their enterprise credentials and complying with their security policies At the same time, they need to manage their relationship with Auth0 in a centralized way The Administration Experience Engineering team is committed to providing administrators in large organizations the seamless, transparent, and secure experience they expect from an enterpriseready SaaS productDuring the last year, we have built a completely new Dashboard for Administrators to manage their tenants and team members from the centralized place This solution consists of a web application created with TypeScript and React web framework and a Nodejs application for serving the backend REST API Its currently in early access with plans for going GA in 2021 In addition, we are currently working on introducing a set of new roles into Auth0 Manage Dashboard to support Role Base Access Control RBAC in this applicationDue to the success and growth of Auth0 we are looking for an engineer to help us build an amazing product and experience We are aiming to increase our team in order to take some new big projects to help grow our product Some of the projects in our roadmap include tenant and team management public APIs, extended RBAC on both account and tenantlevel finegrain authorizationAuth0 safeguards more than 45 billion login transactions each month and its top priorities are availability and securityWe like to think that we are helping make the internet safer Our team is spread across more than 35 countries and we are proud to continually be recognized as a great place to work Culture is critical to us, and we are transparent about our vision and principles Auth0 is an Equal Employment Opportunity employer Auth0 conducts all employmentrelated activities without regard to race, religion, color, national origin, age, sex, marital status, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, genetics, or status as a Vietnamera special disabled and other covered veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law Auth0 participates in EVerify and will confirm work authorization for candidates residing in the United States

Job Title: App Developer wanted in Rotterdam center at Sounders Music
Job Description: TaakomschrijvingDo you want to gain experience in a fastgrowing music tech company Then come and work at dit bedrijf for at least five months Our office is located in the Millennial Tower of Rotterdam which is less than two minutes walking from Central StationOur Mission is to create the new market standard to discover new potential hits and successfully guide music talent dit bedrijf has developed their own technology since 2012 in the Netherlands with a focus on the entertainment branch The technology, includes sophisticated algorithms, dataproviding and analyses possibilities, apps, uploadportals and statistics and is able to make hitpredictions about the success of contentWe believe that we have the power to innovate with companies, while at the same time we understand the practical needs to achieve our goals Our software can be customized and tailormade to fit business and users needs dit bedrijfs solutions are the technology assets and can be used for data enrichment for strategic decisions The software is userinterface friendly in combination with refined algorithms based on mathematics and statisticsDuring a five or sixmonth program depending on your requirements, guided by our head of technology, you will learn how to build a productionready native Kotlin app from scratch, based on API documentation and Figma designs Well help you understand Kotlin coroutines, custom views, audio visualization and a whole lot more There will be a lot of selfstudy and hard work required, but if you finish the project during your internship, an additional financial reward awaits you Additionally, well then get you acquainted with buttersmooth animations and gestures using reactnative app developmentWe like to occasionally work remotely and have flexible working hours We actively stimulate commuting outside of rush hours This does also mean that days can start late and end late Well work with you to fit this internship into your schedule, as long as you work with us to fit it into oursWil je graag meer zien Log in of schrijf je inNu solliciteren

Job Title: PDEng Trainee - Smart cities simulation platform developer - Utrecht
Job Description: PDEng position description  Simulation platform developerDevelopments in the field of IT make it possible to connect more and more devices Sensors, Vehicles, buildings, Humans, etc to each other via new generation networks Remote control of thermostat or home lighting system via smartphone is already possible for several years The expectation is that in the future billions of devices will be connected via the internet We are talking about the Internet of Things IoT IoT makes buildings and cities increasingly smarter This PDEng position is within the TUeKPN flagship, where both SmartONE and SmartTWO projects have been launched In the SmartONETWO projects, we are investigating the possibilities of achieving a more integral systemic framework for IoT in smart cities The work is being carried out by 9 PhD students and 2 PDEng students affiliated with TU Eindhoven supported by experts from KPN Dutch Telecom Company and professors from the TU Eindhoven As one of the PDEng students, you will tackle the challenge of Simulation of autonomous vehicles in a smart city environment You will mainly work with simulation toolsplatforms and work on social challengebased use cases to implement the linkage of 2 PhDs projects which are named, Urban traffic data engineering using Semantic Web technologies to support Autonomous Vehicles, and  Enable new digital service by using semantic web technologies to create dynamic data clusters of usercentered digital twins Meanwhile, you will support these two PhDs projects as well Currently, there are no integral solutions for smart mobility that are using the latest IoT technologies within the field of data science for optimization of energy consumptionemission for autonomous and electric mobility within smart urban environments For this PDEng project you will be in charge of developing a part of such an integrated solution The aim of this PDEng project is to deliver a simulation platform that simulate the impacts of autonomous vehicles in a smart city environment based on the latest trends in data science and mobility domains The developed platform will enable the integration of data from autonomous vehicles, IoT devices, and built environments through an opensource simulation platform such as SUMO From the simulations with this platform we expect to find new opportunities for development of predictive and control models that can be used in mobilityrelated services in smart citiesPDEng program general descriptionThe Department of the Built Environment of the Eindhoven University of Technology offers you a trainee position to follow a twoyear postmaster technological designer program, which leads to the degree of Professional Doctorate in Engineering PDEng The SEBC program consists of two main parts Workshops You will follow technical workshops in which you acquire knowledge concerning important concepts of disciplines other than your own master specialism You will follow these workshops with other SEBC trainees all with different master specialisms The workshops increase your ability to effectively and efficiently communicate with these other disciplines in multidisciplinary design teams Furthermore, you will follow workshops on design methods, entrepreneurship and professional skills Design projects You will work on a design project with a group of SEBC trainees and you will work an individual incompany assignment see description above The assignment is a design project in collaboration with a company KPN in this case and the university You work within the company structure facilities, office desk, computer, and other required equipment are provided by the company It is your main responsibility to manage and execute the project You are supported by advisors from the company KPN in this case and advisors from the university A business plan for implementation or marketing of the project or product is part of the final deliverables A significant part of the first year of the program is dedicated to the workshops, while the second year is mostly dedicated to the incompany assignment Nonetheless, you will start working on the incompany assignment from the start of the programSmart Buildings  Cities PDEng programThe Smart Buildings  Cities PDEng program wants to contribute to the transition towards smart, intelligent, and sustainable cities where quality of life is high This transition requires new solutions that can only be created through multiscale and transdisciplinary design approaches The transition is a relevant theme for society as reflected by the Horizon 2020 Societal Challenges formulated by the European Commission, building industry and university consider the TUes Strategic Areas Energy, Health and Smart Mobility and the TUes Smart Cities Program This requires technical designers who are able to work in a multidisciplinary environment and know how to communicate with different disciplines and stakeholders This PDEng program educates trainees to become those technical designers Please note that this program is about technological design, ie, the process of solving problems by means of technological design, this in contrast to PhD research, which is the process of understanding problems After the two year program, our trainees become technical designers with a broad technical understanding of smart cities and related disciplines in the built environment mechanical engineering, electrical engineering, building physics and services and ICT, who excel in their own discipline and who are able to work in multidisciplinary design teams, contribute to designing issues outside their own core disciplines, integrate different technologies into new products and concepts, and who understand the commercial aspects of these innovative products and concepts

FunctieomschrijvingZonder onze applicaties is risicodetectie op onder meer containerschepen in de Rotterdamse haven niet mogelijk Er ontstaan files van vrachtwagens die de containers willen ophalen Daarnaast groeit het risico dat gevaarlijke goederen ons land in komen Kortom ik draag bij aan een boeiend proces Rolf Brinkmann, Blazeontwikkelaar bij de DouaneDe informatievoorzieningsorganisatie IVorganisatie van de Douane is verantwoordelijk voor en verzorgt de ICTvoorzieningen Deze IVorganisatie ontwikkelt, onderhoudt en beheert het merendeel van de applicaties op dit moment zelf, in het eigen datacenter De afdeling IV Douane werkt dagelijks aan het aanpassen en ontwikkelen van nieuwe geautomatiseerde systemen, zodat de Douane aan de Nederlandse en EUwetgeving kan blijven voldoen Ook ondersteunen de IVcollegas bij de handhaving van invoerrechten en accijnzen, dragen ze bij aan het Douanetoezicht en zorgen ze voor de digitalisering van de communicatie tussen de Douane en bedrijven De werkzaamheden op de afdeling zijn verdeeld over vijfentwintig multidisciplinaire scrumteams die werken volgens de agilemethodiek en business rule management De teams bestaan uit ontwerpers, ontwikkelaars, testers, beheerders en praktijkdeskundigen Ieder team heeft ook een scrummaster en productownerIn jouw rol van Blazeontwikkelaar Douane werk je binnen het scrumteam dat verantwoordelijk is voor het ontwikkelen, beheren en beschikbaar stellen van voorzieningen met betrekking tot risicodetectie en selectie Je richt je op het technisch ontwerpen, programmeren en unittesten van BlazeRMA en Javaprogrammatuur Voor collegaontwikkelaars ben jij coach en vraagbaak Je deelt je expertise met je collegas en de rest van onze organisatie Dit doe je onder meer via presentaties en workshops, en door deel te nemen aan expertisegroepen die vooral bedoeld zijn voor kennisdelingAls Blazeontwikkelaar Douane ondersteun je je teamleden wanneer het gaat om het ontwerpen, beheren en testen Tshaped model van applicaties Als actief deelnemer aan het scrumteam draag je bij aan het verfijnen van backlogitems, het plannen van iteraties en het meten en verbeteren van de uitgevoerde werkzaamheden Je werkt samen met andere scrumteams en zorgt er zo voor dat de keten altijd optimaal functioneert Ook ondersteun en vervang je daar waar nodig collegas binnen het scrumteamZullen we zakendoen en word jij de nieuwe collega van Rolf Of wil je liever eerst eens praten over jouw misschien wel toekomstige werkzaamheden Neem dan contact met ons op

IntroductionAn exciting opportunity has arisen for a senior application engineer to join an established semiconductor company based in the region NoordBrabant and ZuidHolland Our client develops high performance, low power mixedsignal integrated circuits for automotive and portable applications Besides the analog front end the digital part of the Radio cores is a combination of peripherals, filters, and a DSP core For this client we are now looking for an experienced Application engineersOrganizationFunctionWe are looking for a mediorsenior experienced Application engineer who has experience in system engineering You will be responsible for the verification and validation of integrated circuitsDo you think that you are the right fit for this role Contact us and we will discuss the possibilities with youBachelor or Master in ElectronicaElectrical engineering or similarExperience with Analog or RF Circuit design, analogdigital modulation methods and signal processing techniquesKnowledge on receiver performance aspects like noise, intermodulation and selectivityA minimum of 3 years in RFIC applicationsExperience in working in projects, teamplayer, flexible in work planning, open voor travelling, good communication skills, customer responsiveness and fluent in EnglishOfferThe right candidate will be provided a challenging and varied position in a professional, hightech environmentAn appropriate salaryFuture prospects and excellent benefits are evidentThe possibility to participate in a collective health insuranceInformationDo you feel you are the most suitable person for this position or do you have any further questionsEmail your resume  motivation to ahooijmanstrinamicsnl or call at 31 06 26 01 28 52 and ask for AntonApplicationAnton Hooijmans 31 06 26 01 28 52

Application deadline 30 November 2020We are looking forWe are seeking a senior level backend developer with working experience in Unity development to join our team GEMH Lab Games for Emotional and Mental Health is an interdisciplinary team of researchers and scientists, designers, engineers and artists who create engaging digital prototypes as a delivery system for mental and emotional wellbeing We collaborate with research institutes that study these prototypes for efficacy and impactAs our Senior Backend Engineer you will develop and maintain secure and scalable backend solutions for our prototypes that will initially be used in private research, followed by commercial release pending research results Most of your day will be dedicated to software design, API technology, research, coding and documentation The development team which you will be part of is expected to provide user support for the tools developed and design guidelines for other team members from various disciplines This position requires a strong work ethic and the ability to initiate and regulate tasks independently remote work is highly recommended At the GEMH Lab we work with a variety of professionals and technologies to offer the best solutions As a result we have used different programming languages, frameworks, databases and libraries You therefore need to be flexible in switching between various technologies and remain current with new innovationsWe askResponsibilitiesRequirementsSkillsPreferred qualificationsWe areYou will work closely together with an interdisciplinary team of game designers and scientists to engineer effective video game solutions for young people with complex mental and emotional health issues You will be part of the Games for Emotional and Mental Health Lab GEMH, a research lab that designs and evaluates video game interventions for mental and emotional wellbeing We are part of the Behavioural Science Institute BSI at Radboud University Nijmegen, NetherlandsBSI is part of the Faculty of Social Sciences at Radboud University It is a multidisciplinary behavioural research institute Our researchers collaborate across the boundaries of psychology, educational science and communication science BSI has seven research programmes covering three major research themes 1 development and learning, 2 psychopathology, health and wellbeing, and 3 social processes and communication BSI is globally recognised for its topquality research on human behaviour We conduct fundamental research as well as appliedtranslational researchBSI has stateoftheart research facilities for observational studies, experiments, eyetracking studies, EEG and other physiological measures, and behavioural measurements in real and 3D virtual environments The neuroimaging facilities of the Donders Centre for Cognitive Neuroimaging fMRI, MEG and TMS are available for research on the neural bases of behaviour Moreover, BSI is known for its successful graduate school and strong commitment to Open Science For more information, see our websiteWe want to get the best out of science, others and ourselves Why Because this is what the world around us desperately needs Leading research and education make an indispensable contribution to a healthy, free world with equal opportunities for all This is what unites the more than 22,000 students and 5,000 employees at Radboud University And this requires even more talent, collaboration and lifelong learning You have a part to playWe offerWould you like more informationFor more information about this vacancy, please contactHanneke Scholten, Postdoctoral researcherEmail hscholtenpworunlKen Koontz, Creative DirectorEmail KKoontzpworunlApply directlyPlease address your application to Hanneke Scholten and submit it, using the application button, no later than 30 November 2020, 2359 Amsterdam Time ZoneYour application should include the following attachmentsThe interviews will take place online in week 49 andor 50

Are you a Senior Software Developer wanting to join a disruptive Dutch scaleup Do you want to make people feel good using PythonFor our client in Amsterdam, Sterrk is looking for aOur client was founded in 2014 by three friends whom wanted to disrupt a market and make people feel good It is their mission to be the dominating premium brand when it comes to feeling good on a subscription base Since they founded the company, they have grown their company to 100 people in The Netherlands and have opened up shop in 6 different countries In the Amsterdam HQ, they have 20 different nationalities working in a very creative environment The feelgood products they deliver are all around the office and you see that its a young, vibrant atmosphere Lunch is daily made and super fresh Walking in here really gives you the feeling of a diverse workplace 50 women, 50 men and the average age is approximately 30This ITcompany delivers a physical product to the doorsteps of its subscribers The consumer can choose any style, delivery moment and frequency of delivery of their products Because freshness of the delivered product is key, our client has direct contact with over 350 producers of fresh productsOver the past 5 years they have built all their backoffice applications themselves The company is growing fast, however they have now made a plan to rebuild their back office systems to secure the scalability of the platform They plan to increase 10 times what they do now This means they are moving away from PHP and are building all new features in Python They spend about 30 of their time in cleaning up technical debtAs a Senior Python Developer you will work in a team of 10 engineers You will work on features that can predict the amount of products needed over the coming months, but could also work on a delivery application or an internal tool to make marketing outings It is expected of you to be an engineer by heart You will work mainly in Python, but will have to deal with PHP and NodeJS as well Other technologies in the stack are Docker, CircleCI, MySQL, React, Redux and Google Cloud Of course, as a Senior Developer you will have architectural responsibilities Within the team you will find a challenging technical environment in a safe environment where making mistakes is supported As long as you learn They often do Pair Programming and you will be given the opportunity to learn from highly skilled colleaguesPlease send your resume to click apply or call him at click apply  click apply

Job Title: PDEng Trainee - Smart cities simulation platform developer - Eindhoven
Job Description: Job DescriptionPDEng position description  Simulation platform developerDevelopments in the field of IT make it possible to connect more and more devices Sensors, Vehicles, buildings, Humans, etc to each other via new generation networks Remote control of thermostat or home lighting system via smartphone is already possible for several years The expectation is that in the future billions of devices will be connected via the internet We are talking about the Internet of Things IoT IoT makes buildings and cities increasingly smarterThis PDEng position is within the TUeKPN flagship, where both SmartONE and SmartTWO projects have been launched In the SmartONETWO projects, we are investigating the possibilities of achieving a more integral systemic framework for IoT in smart cities The work is being carried out by 9 PhD students and 2 PDEng students affiliated with TU Eindhoven supported by experts from KPN Dutch Telecom Company and professors from the TU Eindhoven As one of the PDEng students, you will tackle the challenge of Simulation of autonomous vehicles in a smart city environment You will mainly work with simulation toolsplatforms and work on social challengebased use cases to implement the linkage of 2 PhDs projects which are named, Urban traffic data engineering using Semantic Web technologies to support Autonomous Vehicles, and  Enable new digital service by using semantic web technologies to create dynamic data clusters of usercentered digital twins Meanwhile, you will support these two PhDs projects as wellCurrently, there are no integral solutions for smart mobility that are using the latest IoT technologies within the field of data science for optimization of energy consumptionemission for autonomous and electric mobility within smart urban environments For this PDEng project you will be in charge of developing a part of such an integrated solution The aim of this PDEng project is to deliver a simulation platform that simulate the impacts of autonomous vehicles in a smart city environment based on the latest trends in data science and mobility domains The developed platform will enable the integration of data from autonomous vehicles, IoT devices, and built environments through an opensource simulation platform such as SUMO From the simulations with this platform we expect to find new opportunities for development of predictive and control models that can be used in mobilityrelated services in smart citiesThe Department of the Built Environment of the Eindhoven University of Technology offers you a trainee position to follow a twoyear postmaster technological designer program, which leads to the degree of Professional Doctorate in Engineering PDEng The SEBC program consists of two main partsA significant part of the first year of the program is dedicated to the workshops, while the second year is mostly dedicated to the incompany assignment Nonetheless, you will start working on the incompany assignment from the start of the programThe Smart Buildings  Cities PDEng program wants to contribute to the transition towards smart, intelligent, and sustainable cities where quality of life is high This transition requires new solutions that can only be created through multiscale and transdisciplinary design approaches The transition is a relevant theme for society as reflected by the Horizon 2020 Societal Challenges formulated by the European Commission, building industry and university consider the TUes Strategic Areas Energy, Health and Smart Mobility and the TUes Smart Cities ProgramThis requires technical designers who are able to work in a multidisciplinary environment and know how to communicate with different disciplines and stakeholders This PDEng program educates trainees to become those technical designers Please note that this program is about technological design, ie, the process of solving problems by means of technological design, this in contrast to PhD research, which is the process of understanding problemsAfter the two year program, our trainees become technical designers with a broad technical understanding of smart cities and related disciplines in the built environment mechanical engineering, electrical engineering, building physics and services and ICT, who excel in their own discipline and who are able to work in multidisciplinary design teams, contribute to designing issues outside their own core disciplines, integrate different technologies into new products and concepts, and who understand the commercial aspects of these innovative products and conceptsWe are looking forFor more information please visit
